attributes.action: Rebate or exempt congestion charges amid Covid-19 outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: We are in the 'contain'/'delay' phase of this virus and changing the rules will help people to keep some distance while travelling for work in Central London as underground can be most contagious for people if we have even one person positive for Covid-19 without symptoms on the carriage.
attributes.background: We are in the 'contain'/'delay' phase of this virus and changing the rules will help people to keep some distance while travelling for work in Central London.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
